# grade

**Instance Property**

The grade of the filter, which determines when it acts relative to other filters.

## Declaration

```swift
var grade: NEFilterManager.Grade { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default grade is [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterManager/Grade-swift.enum/firewall].

## Prioritizing filters

- **NEFilterManager.Grade**: A type for the grade or priority of the filter.
